Object.Name: Parking Spot
Object.Description1: This custom object is used to represent some details of a parking spot. A parking spot might contain a sensor to detect its occupancy. This sensor might be accessible through a different object.

Item.Name: Parking Spot ID
Item.Description: Identity of the parking spot, based on the host name. When multiple LwM2M clients run on the same host, used a "-N" sequence number to make the distinction.

Item.Name: Parking Spot State
Item.Description: Is the parking spot free, reserved or occupied? The state might be reflected in a status LED if it exits

Item.Name: Vehicle ID
Item.Description: The ID of the vehicle that reserved the spot.

Item.Name: Lot name
Item.Description: The name of the parking lot where the parking spot belongs to. The value should be non-volatile, such that after a restart, it will connect to the matching parking lot server
